name: Pencil Sharpening Championship
description:
Can you become the world's ultimate Pencil Sharpening Champion? There's only one way to find out...

This game was made in less than a  week with C++ and SDL2.

How to play
  • Mash the arrow keys when the arrows appear.

If you want to see more, you can check out the video I made about it.

Music by Alex McCulloch
